request.description: Login as User but email or password was wrong
Login as User
Get user profile or user info for user has been login
Admin cand delete user by user id

item.description: Includes endpoints for CRUD operations for managing Users, User registration, login, and authentication using JWT tokens.

item.name: Cart Endpoints

request.description: User add product to his Cart.
User remove product from his cart by sending product id in url as paramter.
Get all items that exist in user cart.
GET Total amount or Total price for all items that exist in user cart.

item.description: Includes endpoints for CRUD operations for managing User Cart.

item.name: Orders Endpoints

request.description: User make order, order will be all items that exist in his cart.
User get all orders have been made by him.

User gets details or items that exist in a specific order that has been made by him.  
by sending order id in URL as parameter.
